ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies.IStrategy

Packages that use IStrategy

Uses of IStrategy in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service
 

Classes in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service with type parameters of type IStrategy
 class StrategyQueue<Strategy extends IStrategy>
          Implements an IPriorityQueue for IStrategy elements.
 

Methods in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service that return types with arguments of type IStrategy
private static StrategyManager<IStrategy> DetectionService.getManagerByType(int type)
          Get the corresponding StrategyManager to the given Manager-Type
 

Methods in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service with parameters of type IStrategy
private static String DetectionService.printStrategy(IStrategy strategy, int type)
          Get String-representation of the given IStrategy to be send over the AIDL-interface
 

Uses of IStrategy in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies
 

Classes in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies with type parameters of type IStrategy
 class StrategyManager<Strategy extends IStrategy>
          Abstract Base Class for a class managing objects implementing IStrategy.
 

Subinterfaces of IStrategy in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies
 interface ICharacterDetectionStrategy
          Interface to describe an IStrategy detecting Characters out of the given MicroGestures and returning the detected Characters.
 interface IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy
          Interface to describe a strategy detecting MicroGestures in the TouchPoints of the given MicroGestures and returning the detected MicroGestures.
 interface IPostprocessingStrategy
          Interface to describe a strategy postprocessing a series of detected Characters.
 interface IPreprocessingStrategy
          Interface to describe a strategy preprocessing a series of TouchPoints enclosed in a MicroGesture container and returning the processed points as one.
 

Classes in ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies that implement IStrategy
 class BaseStrategy
          Abstract Base Class for strategies.
 class CharacterDetectionStrategyDummyGraph
          Implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy using a VERY basic graph created by GraphFactoryDummy.
 class CharacterDetectionStrategyGraph
          Implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy using a graph created by an IGraphFactory.
 class CharacterDetectionStrategyNone
          Example of an implementation of ICharacterDetectionStrategy doing nothing, except returning the "Null"-Character.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCircles
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects circles in the given MicroGestures.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCombine
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which combines MicroGesture with others when needed.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyCurvature
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy that recognizes MicroGestures by changes in curvature.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyEdges
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects edges in the paths of the TouchPoints of the given MicroGestures.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyHalfCircle
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects half circles in the given MicroGestures.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyLines
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which detects lines in the given MicroGestures.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyNone
          Example of an implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy doing nothing except returning the MicroGestures given to it.
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyPrediction
          Deprecated. 
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategyRemoveTiny
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which removes all MicroGestures that do not meet its size requirements (that do not have enough points).
 class MicroGestureDetectionStrategySmoothing
          Implementation of IMicroGestureDetectionStrategy which applies an IPreprocessingStrategy to all given MicroGestures to smooth their points' path.
 class PathSmoothingStrategyAverage
          Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that smoothes the path of the given TouchPoints by calculating their average and adjusting them accordingly.
 class PathSmoothingStrategySpline
          Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that smoothes the path of the given TouchPoints by calculating a spline curve over them and adjusting them accordingly.
 class PostprocessingStrategyNone
          Example of an implementation of IPostprocessingStrategy doing nothing except returning the Characters given to it.
 class PreprocessingStrategyNormalizePoints
          Implementation of IPreprocessingStrategy that normalizes the points of the path of the given TouchPoints.
